Html:
Hi Radioman,
Thanks for making such an awesome product. It works well and is stable. I have 50+ customers using an application with your map and they love it.

In my Windows Project when I add a Web Reference and build the project I get an

Error 9 An attempt was made to load an assembly with an incorrect format: C:\Users\xxxx\Documents\Visual Studio 2010\Projects\PTZ6\PTZ6\x64\System.Data.SQLite.DLL.

If I remove the Web Reference, the project builds with no problems.

Do you know why and a workaround?

Thanks!
I figured it out. I had to add a proxy class instead of adding a Web reference in Microsoft Visual Studio. Thanks!
